tag_list: seo, mrchewy, search, google, minnesota, miami, florida, marketing
overview:
Brent Rangen Director of Search Marketing

With over 10 years in the search industry, Brent knows what it takes to achieve search results.

Brent is the 2010 Small Biz Discovery contest winner (Bruce Clay, Inc.), Search Engine Watch (SEW) news author, and previous owner of the Optimize Guy. Brent is a consistent voice in search and social media and has worked very hard to have an impact on the way inbound marketing is perceived in the business industry.

As Director of Search Marketing for MrChewy.com, Brent is responsible for all planning and implementation of our SEO strategy with the single focus of creating the ultimate industry leading benchmark in SEO.

When heâ€™s not pouring over volumes of data and devising avant-garde strategies, Brent enjoys table tennis and squeaky cheese from Wisconsin.
